description: `SecurityCommunicationFactory::createServicesLoader()` in `Spryker\Zed\Security\Communication\SecurityCommunicationFactory::createServicesLoader()` contains 2 new statements which violates rule "A `create*()` method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."

`SecurityCommunicationFactory::createUserPasswordValidatorConstraint()` in `Spryker\Zed\Security\Communication\SecurityCommunicationFactory::createUserPasswordValidatorConstraint()` contains 2 new statements which violates rule "A `create*()` method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."

`SecurityCommunicationFactory::createSecurityApplicationBooter()` in `Spryker\Zed\Security\Communication\SecurityCommunicationFactory::createSecurityApplicationBooter()` contains 2 new statements which violates rule "A `create*()` method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."
